body_html:
@bkovalev when I execute
mst start
Starting MST (Mellanox Software Tools) driver set
Loading MST PCI module - Success
Loading MST PCI configuration module - Success
Create devices
Unloading MST PCI module (unused) - Success
mst status
MST modules:

MST PCI module is not loaded
MST PCI configuration module loaded

MST devices:

/dev/mst/mt4115_pciconf0 - PCI configuration cycles access.
domain🚌dev.fn=0000:84:00.0 addr.reg=88 data.reg=92
Chip revision is: 00
echo 0000:05:00.0 > /sys/bus/pci/drivers/mlx5_core/unbind
I got the following error
bash: echo: write error: No such device

body:
@bkovalev when I execute
mst start
Starting MST (Mellanox Software Tools) driver set
Loading MST PCI module - Success
Loading MST PCI configuration module - Success
Create devices
Unloading MST PCI module (unused) - Success
mst status
MST modules:
------------
    MST PCI module is not loaded
    MST PCI configuration module loaded

MST devices:
------------
/dev/mst/mt4115_pciconf0         - PCI configuration cycles access.
                                   domain:bus:dev.fn=0000:84:00.0 addr.reg=88 data.reg=92
                                   Chip revision is: 00
echo 0000:05:00.0 > /sys/bus/pci/drivers/mlx5_core/unbind
I got the following error
bash: echo: write error: No such device
